title: Gainesville City Manager concerned about finance department's "Significant turnover" - mycbs4.com
content: Gainesville City Manager concerned about finance department's "Significant turnover"  mycbs4.com
description: Later this week, Gainesville Commissioners will accept a memo from their interim City Manager, Cynthia Curry, into the record. The memo raises concerns about ongoing issues with the city's financial department. "Internal controls over financial reporting have been documented issues since FY (fiscal year) 2018.
